ARABIC: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They could not stand upright and they were not helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And neither stand up nor defend themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They were unable even to stand up or protect themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They were unable to stand up, nor were they helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they were neither able to stand up, nor were they able to take revenge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then they were unable to rise up, nor could they help themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they were not able to rise up, nor could they defend themselves-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and they were not able to stand upright, and were not helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they were unable to rise up, nor could they help themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they could not stand up again, nor could they defend themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So they were not able to stand, nor could they help themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So they were neither able to rise up, nor to come to one another’s aid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then they could not even stand (on their feet), nor could they help themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then they were unable to rise up, nor could they help themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: they could neither stand up straight, nor were they helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They could not rise up, nor could they find help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:45] So they were unable to rise up, they could not get up upon the sending down of the chastisement, nor were they victors, over the One Who destroyed them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they were unable to rise up) following Allah's chastisement, (nor could they help themselves) nor could their bodies avert the chastisement.
